messages.subject: Re: Re: Proud non-christian
messages.msgSnippet: ... I cannot answer for Tracy, however I am most decidedly and wholeheartedly glad that I am not Christian, and am most decidedly and wholeheartedly happy and
messages.messageBody:
>
><< Sometimes I'm glad I'm not Christian >>
>
>Tracy,
>sounds like you are saying the converse of this then...
>other times you are not glad to be a non-Christian?
>God loves you!!

I cannot answer for Tracy, however I am most decidedly and wholeheartedly
glad that I am not Christian, and am most decidedly and wholeheartedly
happy and satisfied to be who I am. I KNOW that both the Goddess and the
God love me, in all their incarnations, and that I am a child of their
creation.

You however, sound like you are saying that NOT being Christian is
wrongheaded and misguided. I can only assume that such an assumtion comes
of living in a country that can be often very slanted toward Christianity.
I feel the need to remind you of the Millions and Millions of thinking,
feeling, contributing, spiritual, soulfull human beings on this planet who
are most decidedly NOT Christian, and PROUD of it!!
Goddess Loves You!!

Nanci K. in Idaho
